statements: DELETE FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 100 AND patient_id = 50 OR feedback_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 200 OR (patient_id = 75 AND survey_score < 75);
DELETE FROM PatientSurvey WHERE patient_id = 5 AND survey_score < 3;
DELETE FROM PatientSurvey WHERE survey_score > 80 AND patient_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM PatientFeedback WHERE feedback_date < '2022-01-01' OR feedback_text LIKE '%negative%';
DELETE FROM mental_health_programs WHERE program_name = 'Stress Management';
